main event: Witnesses observed 4 glowing objects in the northern sky near Dallas, Texas on December 5, 1957.
interesting points: The objects were described as glowing and seemed to be surrounded by a glow,Despite the observer not seeing any other clouds, they speculated that the objects could have been clouds,The sighting lasted for 11 minutes and the objects were moving south at altitudes below 20,000 feet,The witness from December 6, 1967 reported that the objects were blinking on and off and moving rapidly,An FAA control tower official stated that there were 855 aircraft operations at Love Field Airport on the date of the sightings but saw nothing unusual.
witness description: A civilian observer noted the characteristics of the objects during the sighting.
